items.sentence: Tom is convinced that Mary no longer loves him.
Tom is trying to figure out how to do that now.
Tom looked at his watch and then back up at me.
Tom said Mary didn't look much like her sister.
Tom said Mary didn't want to go to the concert.
It makes me very angry when you disobey orders.
It would be nice if Tom could be here tomorrow.
Tom got himself a beer out of the refrigerator.
Tom was teaching French in Australia last year.
You need to do that whether you like it or not.
